Sentencas: In order to reduce the operating temperature of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), anode-supported cells incorporating thin film (similar to 10 mu m) electrolytes in conjunction with anode/electrolyte and cathode/electrolyte interlayers were studied.
Titulo: Characterization of electrolyte-electrode interlayers in thin film solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: SOFC button cells were prepared through deposition of colloidal slurries onto anode supported substrates and were analyzed as a function of temperature and polarization via voltammetry and electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS).
Titulo: Characterization of electrolyte-electrode interlayers in thin film solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was found that the electro-catalytic activity or electrode/electrolyte interfacial areas were enhanced through the addition of these interlayers.
Titulo: Characterization of electrolyte-electrode interlayers in thin film solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This performance improvement was attributed to the introduction of a diffuse mixed conduction region associated with these interlayers.
Titulo: Characterization of electrolyte-electrode interlayers in thin film solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The cathode is thought to benefit disproportionately from this enhancement.
Titulo: Characterization of electrolyte-electrode interlayers in thin film solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Single SOFC button cells with electrode interlayers were then characterized as a function of temperature and polarization to assess the involvement of these interfacial layers.
Titulo: Characterization of electrolyte-electrode interlayers in thin film solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: EIS was applied and the data were used to deconvolute component impedances.
Titulo: Characterization of electrolyte-electrode interlayers in thin film solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Finally electrochemical models were developed to provide a more complete understanding of these assemblies under operation.
Titulo: Characterization of electrolyte-electrode interlayers in thin film solid oxide fuel cells
Characterization of electrolyte-electrode interlayers in thin film solid oxide fuel cells
